intro: Sageretia liuzhouensis, commonly known as the Liuzhou sageretia, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rosaceae family and is characterized by its shrub-like growth habit. The plant produces small, white to pink flowers that bloom in the spring. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and have a serrated margin. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
